snippet: The Chicago Blackhawks reached eight-year extensions Wednesday with Jonathan Toews and Patrick Kane, two of their top performers during a long run of success that included Stanley Cup titles in 2010 and 2013.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks reach eight-year extensions with centers Jonathan Toews and Patrick Kane, two of their top performers; other NHL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Blackhawks reached eight-year extensions Wednesday with Jonathan Toews and Patrick Kane, two of their top performers during a long run of success that included Stanley Cup titles in 2010 and 2013.
